job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As an Azure Engineer in Accenture Technology - Cloud First, you will play a pivotal role in driving our customers' cloud initiatives, leveraging Microsoft's Azure platform to design, build, migrate, and optimize scalable cloud solutions. Your expertise will be crucial in advancing our customers' cloud adoption strategies, ensuring security, and optimizing their infrastructure through effective use of Azure's vast toolset and frameworks. Join our team and contribute to shaping the future of our customers' cloud infrastructure, leveraging your expertise in Azure to drive innovation and excellence.
     * People You will collaborate with cross-functional teams, including developers, system administrators, and project managers, to ensure seamless integration and operation of cloud services for our customers. Your ability to communicate effectively and mentor junior team members will be essential in fostering a collaborative and efficient working environment.
     * Process You will lead the implementation of the Cloud Adoption Framework for our customers, ensuring their processes align with best practices for cloud governance, security, and compliance. Your role will involve refining and enhancing our customers' DevOps processes, facilitating continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI / CD) pipelines, and automating infrastructure management using Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools like Bicep or Terraform.
     * Technology Your in-depth understanding of cloud architecture and Azure's capabilities will be instrumental in designing, building, migrating, and optimizing workloads for robust landing zones and other cloud infrastructure components for our customers. You will utilize Azure DevOps tools and services to streamline project workflows and ensure the reliability and scalability of our customers' cloud environments.
     * Task Day-to-day tasks will include designing and building Azure projects from the ground up for our customers, managing their cloud resources, and ensuring optimal performance and security. You will also be responsible for migrating and optimizing workloads to Azure, troubleshooting and resolving issues related to cloud infrastructure, continuously improving our customers' cloud operations, and staying updated with the latest Azure developments and best practices.

   With all our roles, there is some in-person time for collaboration, learning and building relationships with clients, peers, leaders, and communities. As an employer, we will be as flexible as possible to support your specific work / life needs.
job_details.full_text:
Azure Engineer

As an Azure Engineer in Accenture Technology - Cloud First, you will play a pivotal role in driving our customers' cloud initiatives, leveraging Microsoft's Azure platform to design, build, migrate, and optimize scalable cloud solutions. Your expertise will be crucial in advancing our customers' cloud adoption strategies, ensuring security, and optimizing their infrastructure through effective use of Azure's vast toolset and frameworks. Join our team and contribute to shaping the future of our customers' cloud infrastructure, leveraging your expertise in Azure to drive innovation and excellence.
     * People You will collaborate with cross-functional teams, including developers, system administrators, and project managers, to ensure seamless integration and operation of cloud services for our customers. Your ability to communicate effectively and mentor junior team members will be essential in fostering a collaborative and efficient working environment.
     * Process You will lead the implementation of the Cloud Adoption Framework for our customers, ensuring their processes align with best practices for cloud governance, security, and compliance. Your role will involve refining and enhancing our customers' DevOps processes, facilitating continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI / CD) pipelines, and automating infrastructure management using Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools like Bicep or Terraform.
     * Technology Your in-depth understanding of cloud architecture and Azure's capabilities will be instrumental in designing, building, migrating, and optimizing workloads for robust landing zones and other cloud infrastructure components for our customers. You will utilize Azure DevOps tools and services to streamline project workflows and ensure the reliability and scalability of our customers' cloud environments.
     * Task Day-to-day tasks will include designing and building Azure projects from the ground up for our customers, managing their cloud resources, and ensuring optimal performance and security. You will also be responsible for migrating and optimizing workloads to Azure, troubleshooting and resolving issues related to cloud infrastructure, continuously improving our customers' cloud operations, and staying updated with the latest Azure developments and best practices.

   With all our roles, there is some in-person time for collaboration, learning and building relationships with clients, peers, leaders, and communities. As an employer, we will be as flexible as possible to support your specific work / life needs.

job_profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on Azure cloud infrastructure management and traditional DevOps practices, with no mention of AI, machine learning, or generative models. It does not align with the core responsibilities or technologies of either an ML Engineer or a GenAI Engineer.

phrases: driving our customers' cloud initiatives
advancing our customers' cloud adoption strategies
align technical solutions with strategic goals
translate business needs into technical requirements
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate a need to understand customer business goals and translate them into cloud solutions, aligning with the definition of understanding broader business context and strategic alignment.

phrases: designing, building, migrate, and optimize scalable cloud solutions
designing and building Azure projects from the ground up
building backend services
ensuring the application is robust and scalable
job_tasks.justification: The description emphasizes building and designing cloud solutions and projects, which aligns with the software development aspect of creating and deploying applications or infrastructure.

phrases: ensuring security, and optimizing their infrastructure
implementing the Cloud Adoption Framework
refining and enhancing our customers' DevOps processes
facilitating continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI / CD) pipelines
automating infrastructure management using Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools
Azure DevOps tools and services to streamline project workflows
ensuring the reliability and scalability of our customers' cloud environments
managing their cloud resources
ensuring optimal performance and security
migrating and optimizing workloads to Azure
troubleshooting and resolving issues related to cloud infrastructure
continuously improving our customers' cloud operations
job_tasks.justification: This role heavily involves DevOps practices, CI/CD, IaC, cloud governance, security, and operational management of cloud infrastructure, which directly maps to the definition of Operations Engineering (MLOps) in a cloud context.

phrases: collaborate with cross-functional teams
communicate effectively
fostering a collaborative and efficient working environment
collaboration, learning and building relationships
staying updated with the latest Azure developments and best practices
troubleshooting and resolving issues related to cloud infrastructure
optimizing their infrastructure
optimizing workloads to Azure
ensuring optimal performance and security
driving our customers' cloud initiatives
drive innovation and excellence
designing and building Azure projects from the ground up
